name: Just Sing! Vol. 2
overview: The follow-up to the karaoke game Just Sing!. New features include an interactive video wall, improved pitch recognition technology,and a challenge mode (no text to sing along to), The game also features co-op and competitive multiplayer modes. The 19 songs in the game are: Cheryl Cole - Fight For This Love Lady Gaga - Paparazzi Lady Gaga - Bad Romance Rihanna - Rude Boy Owl City - Fireflies La Roux - Bulletproof Keri Hilson - I Like Tokio Hotel - Automatic Amy MacDonald - This Is The Life Livingston - Broken Gabriella Cilmi - Sweet about me Milow - You Don't Know Razorlight - Wire To Wire Mando Diao - Dance With SomebodyThe Cardigans - Lovefool The Cardigans - Lovefool Keane - Everybody’s Changing Snow Patrol - Crack The Shutters Snow Patrol - Chasing Cars Mika - We Are Golden
